channel.title: ALL STAR CODE SUMMER INTENSIVE on my new hugo site
channel.description: Recent content in ALL STAR CODE SUMMER INTENSIVE on my new hugo site

item.title: Day 0
item.description: Today is your first day of all star code! woohoo! Your adventure begins now!

item.title: Day 0
item.description: First day of week 1! You’ll be learning what a library is and how to use it this week, starting today! You’ll also be going out and failing for fun!

item.title: Day 0
item.description: This week is about web development. Today you’ll be learning more about HTML and CSS, and creating a fan timeline.

item.title: Day 0
item.description: Week 4! This week is focusing on using javascript along with web development to further your web development skills. Today you’ll be ending the day with some outside activities, after learning about DOM.

item.title: Day 0
item.description: This is the homestretch! This week is about making asynchronous API calls from the client browser…it sounds tougher than it is. Just remember what we covered last week regarding callbacks and parsing JSON and you’ll be fine! HMM…what will your demo day project look like…

item.title: Day 0
item.description: Just one thing to do…work on your demo day project!

item.title: Day 1
item.description: Arrays and loops are two important parts of JS, these two foundational skills could be used to your advantage in many situations to come. Make sure you understand what they are and how they work! Don’t be afraid to ask for help.

item.title: Day 1
item.description: Listen, we know you guys love boxes, so that’s what today is about. You’ll be makinga lot of boxes, I know you want to make boxes all day, but you also have to give time to your mentor, because it’s a Tuesday.

item.title: Day 1
item.description: Today is a bit more about CSS, and some bad HTML, as well as it being a Tuesday which means… Mentorship!

item.title: Day 1
item.description: More DOM! It’s like the new boxes eh? Not only that but it’s Tuesday, so you’ll end the day with your fourth session of mentorship.

item.title: Day 1
item.description: Firebase! Firebase is a data storing API made by Google for your use. Followed by your second to last mentorship session!

item.title: Day 1
item.description: Just one thing to do…work on your demo day project!

item.title: Day 2
item.description: Conditionals are yet another foundational skill that could really help you out. Not only that but you also have your site visit today as it’s Wednesday! :smiley: Have fun!

item.title: Day 2
item.description: Ever played battleship? Before you go on your second site visit you’ll be learning about what an MVP is, reading documentation, and making your own MVP.

item.title: Day 2
item.description: Wednesday! You’ll be learning more about layouts, polishing your resume :page_facing_up: and of course going on your site visit!

item.title: Day 2
item.description: Objects, Mock Interviews, and Site Visits. Oh my!

item.title: Day 2
item.description: Today is about exploring APIs and taking what you know to make something fun! Followed by some real talk about minorities in tech.

item.title: Day 2
item.description: Just one thing to do…work on your demo day project!

item.title: Day 3
item.description: Functions are awesome, and super useful, make sure you can use them because they are definitely one of the most important skills in Javascript. You’ll also be introduced to the Facebook of the professional world, LinkedIn. And you’ve got a guest speaker at the end of the day!

item.title: Day 3
item.description: Gotta catch em all! Today’s theme: Pokemon! You’ll be recreating a pokemon battle using p5.js and all the other skills you’ve picked up so far! As well as wireframing, and a guest speaker

item.title: Day 3
item.description: For most of the day today you’ll be working with your new company super stellar games, after a codealong. You’ll be ending the day with a Guest speaker though.

item.title: Day 3
item.description: One aspect of coding that hasn’t been touched on yet is data. A crucial part of many applications and programs involves the transmission of data. You’ll be learning about and using a common data type today called JSON, and ending your day with a guest speaker!

item.title: Day 3
item.description: Custom day! Today you’ll be doing custom lessons designed by your lead instructor and Teaching fellow.

item.title: Day 3
item.description: Just one thing to do…work on your demo day project!

item.title: Day 4
item.description: This is the last day of your first full week at All Star Code! You’ve got a big project for today. Along with Battleroom and the return statement. Have fun!

item.title: Day 4
item.description: Space invaders!!! Whoop whoop! also Battleroom

item.title: Day 4
item.description: Personal websites are fun, you can do whatever you want on your site! After Battleroom that is.

item.title: Day 4
item.description: You’ll be ending your week with a fresh Battleroom :bomb: and a prior project. And of course an end of week survey.

item.title: Day 4
item.description: Time sure does fly. You’re already near the end of the program! There’s just one major project left to do, your Demo Day Project! Good luck!

item.title: Day 4
item.description: WIP
